CSSTransformComponentToString.summary: The toString() method of the interface is a {{Glossary("stringifier")}} returning a CSS Transforms function.
CSSTransformComponentToString.returns: A string in the form of a CSS transform-function.This will use the value of is2D to return either a 2D or 3D transform. For example if the component represents and is2D is false then the string returned will be in the form of the CSS transformation rotate3D() function. If true the string returned will be in the form of the 2-dimensional rotate3D() function.
